visual_style_summary: Luxury yet minimalistic with a high-key studio setting, neutral grey background, soft refined lighting emphasizing clarity and sparkle, creating an ethereal, elegant mood that highlights the craftsmanship and timeless beauty of the diamond ring.

scenes.description: Start with a blurred, abstract macro shot of the ring area, creating a sense of anticipation and mystery, with subtle hints of sparkle emerging.
scenes.camera_angle: macro, shallow focus with a slightly out-of-focus background
scenes.camera_movement: slow, gradual refocus from blurred to sharp
scenes.lighting_setup: High-key, soft, diffused lighting with gentle reflections, ensuring no harsh shadows and highlighting the ring’s texture and brilliance
focus_points: pave accents on the twisted band

scenes.description: Refocused shot of the model's hand with the ring prominently displayed, the hand gently moving into a natural, elegant pose, revealing the ring in full detail.
scenes.camera_angle: macro close-up, focusing on the hand and ring
scenes.camera_movement: slow, subtle push-in towards the hand
scenes.lighting_setup: Consistent high-key, soft lighting, emphasizing the glow of the gold and the sparkle of the diamonds
focus_points: overall elegance of the hand pose

technical_notes: Ensure reflections and sparkle are physically accurate, with caustics responsive to gemstone cuts. Use a 100mm macro lens at f/2.0 for sharp focus and shallow depth of field. Maintain consistent high-key lighting without harsh shadows to preserve a luxurious, clean aesthetic. The ring's shape, size, and reflective properties must remain 100% consistent throughout the shot sequence, avoiding any distortions or effects that alter its geometry or appearance.
